resourceInfo.name: COUNSELING AND PSYCHOLOGICAL SERVICES(CAPS)
resourceInfo.info: CAPS offers mental health services via telehealth resources including screenings, individual therapy, psychiatry, care and case managers. Contact 765-494-6995 for assistance or visit the CAPS website for more information. To support mental health and well-being, CAPS has created a digital repository of applications and online resources written by CAPS staff that you can access at any time.EMERGENCY/CRISIS CONTACTCall 911 if you are experiencing a life threatening mental health emergency.Ask to speak to the Purdue Police CIT Officer.Call CAPS at (765) 494-6995 for mental health crisis situations. A therapist will conduct a crisis assessment and plan for next steps for you.

resourceInfo.name: CENTER FOR ADVOCACY, RESPONSE AND EDUCATION
